mapper.select: select a.pidx,psubject,mname,pmoney,pwridate,uuid,uploadPath,fileName,fileType from PRODUCT32 a left outer join MEMBER32 b on a.midx = b.midx left outer join BOARDATTACH32 c on a.pidx = c.pidx where pdelYn='N' and psaleYn='N' order by a.pidx desc LIMIT 0,#{PAGE}
select * from PRODUCT32 A left outer join MEMBER32 B on A.midx = B.midx left outer join BOARDATTACH32 C on A.pidx = C.pidx where A.pdelYn='N' and A.pidx=#{pidx}
select count(sidx) from SHOPPINGCART32 where pidx = #{0} and midx=#{1}
mapper.update: update PRODUCT32 set pdelyn='Y' where pidx = #{pidx}
update DELIVERY32 set caidx=#{caidx}, dwaybill = #{dwaybill} where oidx = #{oidx}
update ORDER32 set ofinal = 'Y' where oidx=#{oidx}
mapper.select: select * from ORDER32 where pidx = #{pidx} and midx = #{midx}
